text: "Under My Wheels" is a 1971 song by Alice Cooper. It was taken from their fourth studio album Killer. It went to number 59 in the United States. It has been covered live by Hanoi Rocks, Foo Fighters and Manic Street Preachers. It has appeared on their greatest hits compilation albums in 1974, 1989, 1999, 2001 and 2004. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Alice Cooper songs Category:Manic Street Preachers songs Category:Foo Fighters songs
title: Under My Wheels
